4.name: Harpy Slayer
4.description: Clip the wings of these she-beasts.

19.name: Dagger Master
19.description: A slim, elegant blade with so many uses.
19.requirement: Deliver  killing blows with a dagger.

51.name: Wind Rider Slayer
51.description: Tangling with you was the last stupid decision these smart creatures ever made.

54.name: Short-Bow Master
54.description: You deliver pain from a distance.
54.requirement: Deliver  killing blows with a short bow.

75.name: From Howl to Silence
75.description: Your honor is restored. However, you must prepare for a greater danger.
75.requirement: Complete the charr personal story step "Ever Vigilant," "Research and Destroy," or "Whispers of Vengeance."

139.name: Lifetime Survivor
139.requirement: Gain  experience without dying or changing maps.

bits.text: Story Mode
Explorable Mode—Butcher's Path
Explorable Mode—Zealot's Path
Explorable Mode—Plunderer's Path

234.name: Monthly Successful Events
234.description: A friend and hero to all.

284.name: Realm Defender
284.description: If you build it, they will die.

347.name: Don't Touch the Shiny
347.description: You touched the shiny, didn't you?
347.requirement: Offend the skritt in the Ruins of the Unseen.

386.name: Cliffside Fractal Stabilizer
386.requirement: You've completed the Cliffside fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

428.name: Get on the Good List
428.description: ...and it better not be a lump of coal!
428.requirement: Receive a toy from Tixx himself.

546.name: Scholar
546.requirement: Complete Zone 1, Zone 2, and Zone 3 in World 1.

bits.text: Zone 01
Zone 02
Zone 03

555.name: Doctor of Secrets, World 1
555.description: That's Doctor of Secrets to you!
555.requirement: Find all of the hidden rooms (excluding furniture shops) located in World 1.

bits.text: Zone 01
Zone 02
Zone 03

664.name: Ceremony and Acrimony (2013)
664.requirement: Get the wounded Ship's Council members to safety.

682.name: Faster Than Light
682.requirement: Complete Kleptotronic Advanced Designs without being hit by lasers.

684.name: Aether Apprehender: Kryta
684.requirement: Kill Aetherblades in Kryta. Sightings include Gendarran Fields, Bloodtide Coast, and the Sky Pirates story chapter.

688.name: Cornered, Caught, Collared (2013)
688.requirement: You tracked down and subdued the criminal at large. The Lionguard will take it from here.

740.name: Aspect Arena Regular
740.requirement: Participate in  round. Does not contribute to completing the meta-achievement.

891.name: Boss Week: Here Be Dragons!
891.requirement: Participate in the Tequatl encounter, or any other world boss encounter,  times.

894.name: Boss Week: Here Be Dragons!
894.requirement: Participate in the Tequatl encounter, or any other world boss encounter,  times.

933.name: True Friend to Turma
933.description: You don't have to be a guardian to be a guardian angel.
933.requirement: Prevent Turma from falling below 75% health.

954.name: Orr or Orchard
954.requirement: Complete either an Arah or Twilight Arbor dungeon (story or explorable).

985.name: Garnet Leaper in the Mists
985.requirement: Complete the jumping puzzle in Garnet Sanctum.

986.name: Emerald Leaper in the Mists
986.requirement: Complete the jumping puzzle in Emerald Sanctum.

1095.name: Toxic Siege Gardener
1095.requirement: Use mortars to bring down a toxic offshoot.

1156.name: Fractal Fortnight: Trin's End
1156.description: Mai tried, but Trin didn't win.
1156.requirement: You've completed the Captain Mai Trin boss fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

1177.name: Toxic Hallucination Slayer
1177.requirement: Kill  hallucinations triggered by toxic pollen.

1199.name: Aftermath Treasure Hunter
1199.requirement: Open  tri-key chest in the Tower of Nightmares.

1581.name: Destroyer Destroyer
1581.requirement: Kill  destroyer in the Crown Pavilion.

1638.name: Hit and Run
1638.requirement: Use a rock to knock a crystal shard out of Inquest hands while racing them to collect crystal shards for the Zephyrites.

1643.name: No Rock Unturned
1643.requirement: Find and destroy the hidden Inquest survey equipment.

1748.name: Exotic Hunter
1748.requirement: Unlock these  exotic weapon skins from champion bags in your wardrobe.

1749.name: Ambrite Weapon Collection
1749.description: <c=@flavor>Gentt would be so proud of you.</c>
1749.requirement: Unlock all  Ambrite weapons in your wardrobe.

1838.name: Daily Ascalon Forager
1838.description: Fueling the engines of the economy.
1838.requirement: Gather raw materials by foraging plants in the following Ascalon maps: Plains of Ashford, Diessa Plateau, Fields of Ruin, Blazeridge Steppes, Iron Marches, and Fireheart Rise.

1905.name: Daily Griffonrook Run Jumping Puzzle
1905.requirement: Complete the Griffonrook Run jumping puzzle in Lornar's Pass.

1973.name: Daily Maguuma Jungle Forager
1973.description: Fueling the engines of the economy.
1973.requirement: Gather raw materials by foraging plants in the following Maguuma Jungle maps: Caledon Forest, Metrica Province, Brisban Wildlands, Sparkfly Fen, and Mount Maelstrom.

1987.name: Daily Scale 1–10 Fractal
1987.requirement: Complete a set of four fractals on a single difficulty level between 1 and 10 inside the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2041.name: Toy Quality Control
2041.description: Don't they ever test this stuff?
2041.requirement: Defeat misbehaving Wintersday toys while helping Tixx run the workshop or exploring Tyria.

2091.name: Daily Mesmer or Necromancer Winner
2091.requirement: Win  PvP match as a mesmer or necromancer.

2130.name: Dwayna's Weapon Collection
2130.requirement: Unlock all  Dwayna's weapon skins in your wardrobe.

2157.name: Tendril Torchers: Gold
2157.requirement: Burn tendrils and avoid unexploded shot before time runs out!

2168.name: Auric Basin Insight: Masks of the Fallen
2168.requirement: Discover Insights of Maguuma Mastery in Auric Basin.

2173.name: The Ley-Line Run: Gold
2173.requirement: Zap your way through the checkpoints and across the finish line!

2181.name: Revered
2181.description: I call upon the Mists to destroy my enemies!

2195.name: Deathless Escape
2195.requirement: While being pursued by the Mordrem beast, do not die.

2200.name: Fallen Masks: Silver
2200.requirement: Soothe the tormented spirits of fallen Exalted.

2205.name: Mushroom Conservationist
2205.requirement: Help Taimi collect saurian bones without using more than 4 mushrooms.

2226.name: Core-Fractal Hero
2226.requirement: Complete each fractal scale from 21 to 50.

2286.name: Master Mushroom Spelunker
2286.requirement: Find your way to the treasure chest in the mushroom cave in Tangled Depths.

2294.name: Tetrad Trouncer
2294.description: Four times the trouble; four times the fun.
2294.requirement: Defeat the Mordrem tetrad after nightfall in Verdant Brink.

2320.name: Prized Possessions
2320.requirement: Advance deeper into the jungle to continue your search.

2347.name: Mushroom Musterer
2347.description: You helped grow the skritt a mushroom army!
2347.requirement: Raise a mushroom army for the skritt.

2365.name: "Cryptonym" Strongbox
2365.requirement: Search in the Undergrowth Connector area for the strongbox from the "Cryptonym."

2432.name: Wild Abandon
2432.requirement: Collect these  items and skins to receive the berserker's torch, Wild Abandon.
2432.locked_text: Begin training the warrior's berserker elite specialization.

bits.text: Created in the Mystic Forge.
Earn bronze or better in this adventure.
Requires training Stealth Gliding in the Gliding Mastery line.
Purchased from Itzel vendors for airship parts.
Found on ore nodes in Auric Basin. Requires training Exalted Gathering in the Exalted Lore Mastery line.
Defeat a Treasure Mushroom. Requires training Nuhoch Stealth Detection in the Nuhoch Lore Mastery line.
Completely unlock the elite specialization.
Created from a plated weapon purchased for crystalline ore in Dragon's Stand.

2444.name: Chak Killer—Master
2444.requirement: Jump into the pit and kill chak.

2540.name: Flying Circus: Gold
2540.requirement: Glide through the glowing rings and reach the finish line as fast as possible!

2598.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 41
2598.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2662.name: Quick March
2662.requirement: Outrun the ghostly mob in the Spirit Woods in under 2 minutes.

2733.name: League Necromancer—Recruit
2733.description: Completing this achievement advances the League Professional—Recruit achievement.
2733.requirement: Win 5 ranked matches as a necromancer.

2743.name: League Ranger—Veteran
2743.description: Completing this achievement advances the League Profession—Veteran achievement.
2743.requirement: Win 5 ranked matches as a ranger.

2803.name: No-Fly Zone
2803.description: Get down here; we're not done with you!
2803.requirement: Break the Shatterer's defiance bar  time, preventing its Shard Storm attack.

2850.name: Interior Design 103
2850.requirement: Smash ten pieces of furniture in World 1, Zone 3 of Super Adventure Box.

2883.name: Interior Design 101
2883.requirement: Smash ten pieces of furniture in World 1, Zone 1 of Super Adventure Box.

2953.name: Daily Crucible of Eternity
2953.requirement: Complete any path in the Crucible of Eternity explorable dungeon.

2993.name: Pursuit of Knowledge
2993.requirement: Find the unidentified lodestone and return it to Ela Makkay.

3045.name: Daily Tier 3 Chaos
3045.requirement: Complete Chaos at fractal scale 51 or higher.

3184.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 66
3184.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

3185.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 54
3185.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

3239.name: Koda's Blessing
3239.requirement: Earn Koda's Favor by giving burnt offerings.

bits.text: Burn an offering to thank Koda for the steadfastness of his refugees.
Burn an offering to ask Koda's aid to restore the Maguuma Jungle.
Burn an offering to Koda in recognition of the balance of the elements.
Burn an offering to Koda in recognition of peace with the elements.
Burn an offering to Koda for the perpetuation of the quaggan race.
Burn an offering to Koda for interracial peace.
Burn an offering to Koda for the redemption of dragons.
Burn an offering to beseech Koda to restore the majesty of the Maguuma jungle.
Burn an offering to Koda for the resistance against draconic corruption.
Burn an offering to Koda for the sanctuary of his people.
Burn an offering to Koda for his exiled emissaries.
Burn an offering to Koda for the cooperation between races.
Burn an offering to Koda to celebrate the strength of cooperation.
Burn an offering to Koda to celebrate a return to nature.
Burn an offering to Koda to resist otherworldy intrusions.
Burn an offering to Koda to resist elemental manipulation.
Burn an offering to Koda to restore elemental balance.
Burn an offering to Koda for an abundance of life near death.
Burn an offering to Koda to restore the balance of magic.

3286.name: Moonlighting
3286.requirement: Stop the bandit spirits from making off with any lumber from the lumber camp.

3325.name: Siege Breaker
3325.description: Ascalon's Chosen will not be forgotten.
3325.requirement: Earn glory in the Battle of Kyhlo by completing these achievements.

3426.name: Daily Draconis Mons Wurm Boss or Power Suit Boss
3426.requirement: Slay the bloodstone-charged lava wurm or the Inquest power suit.

3453.name: Llama Roundup
3453.description: Looking for llamas in all the wrong places.
3453.requirement: Find  lost llamas in the PvP Lobby.

bits.text: Lost Llama
Lost Black Llama
Lost Emperor Llama
Lost Fancy Llama
Lost Fancy Black Llama
Lost Fancy Emperor Llama
Lost Lavish Llama

Lost Lavish Emperor Llama
Lost Lavish Gold Llama

3555.name: Lost Lore of the Domain of Vabbi
3555.requirement: Collect all of the intelligence report pages to complete the report.

bits.text: Find this page hiding in the bushes of Vehjin.
Seek this page on the cliffs of Yahnur Plateau.
Scour the the Boneyard for this page.
Find this page near trees in Kodash Bazaar.
Climb the tallest point of the Necropolis to find this page.
This page overlooks the Garden of Seborhin.
This page sits high above the Kodash Bazaar.

3768.name: Fang of Mokèlé
3768.requirement: Collect these  items and skins to receive the soulbeast's dagger, Fang of Mokèlé.
3768.locked_text: Begin training the ranger's soulbeast elite specialization.

bits.text: Begin training the ranger's soulbeast elite specialization.
Drops from junundu wurms in the Crystal Desert.
Purchased from Groffmok in Lommuld Kraal in Desert Highlands.
As a ranger, use a Mystic Coin in the wishing well in the Garden of Seborhin, in the Domain of Vabbi.
Complete the bounty for Dorrik the Wanderer in Skyward Reach of the Elon Riverlands.
Purchased from Keeper Pamir at Torment's Watch in the Desolation.
Complete a race event as a ranger in any Crystal Desert map.
Found when identifying gear, or purchased from the Black Lion Trading Post.
Protect wandering spirits from ghost eaters in the Lair of the Forgotten in the Desolation.
Explore above the Maculate Fringe in Crystal Oasis with your jackal.
Drops for rangers from caffeinated skritt in any Crystal Desert map.
Finish training the ranger's soulbeast elite specialization.
Earn map complete on any Crystal Desert map as a ranger.
Craft with recipes purchased in the Desolation or the Domain of Vabbi.

3837.name: The Desolation Legendary Bounties
3837.requirement: Defeat each legendary bounty in the Desolation at least once.

bits.text: Queen Ishraa
Forged Rampager
Awakened Hoarder

3924.name: Serpent Slayer
3924.requirement: Successfully defeat Ysshi Hessani and Pek Rakt Grag in the Grand Court of Sebelkeh.

3949.name: Shifting Sands Weapon Collection
3949.requirement: Unlock all  Shifting Sands weapon skins in your wardrobe.

3975.name: You Left This
3975.requirement: Find Taimi's hair bow and return it to her.

4064.name: Zone Defense
4064.requirement: Successfully fend off the Awakened in each area they invade.

bits.text: Metrica Province
Caledon Forest
Queensdale
Gendarran Fields
Plains of Ashford
Wayfarer Foothills
Awarded from Lasting Bonds: What We Do Here.
Turn in a pocketed Olmakhan bandolier to Efi, near the southern gate of Atholma.
Defeat and collect the bounty for the legendary hydra Starcaller.
Defeat and collect the bounty for the legendary mummy Seneb the Desecrated.
Gain access to the Specimen Chamber and investigate it.
Found in a chest in the depths of a cave in the Whispering Grottos of Elon Riverlands.
Defeat both bosses in the Specimen Chamber.
Bring Mom's Bow to Efi.

4114.name: The Road to Rata Primus
4114.description: Journal: The Road to Rata Primus
4114.requirement: Disable Rata Primus's communications tower and shield.

4162.name: Inquest Mark II Weapon Collection
4162.requirement: Unlock all  Inquest Mark II weapon skins in your wardrobe.

4182.name: Pond Scum
4182.description: Maybe next time you won't take things that don't belong to you.
4182.requirement: Slay the crazed broodmother at Ntouka Pond.

4278.name: Boss Blitz: Halt Hablion
4278.requirement: Defeat Justiciar Hablion during a Boss Blitz event in the Crown Pavilion.

4329.name: Ogre Obliterator
4329.requirement: Kill  ogre in the Crown Pavilion.

4343.name: I Brought a Friend
4343.description: Why fight your own battles when you can make someone else do it for you?

4380.name: Jahai Insight: Crescent's Prosperity
4380.requirement: Discover this Mastery Insight in Jahai Bluffs.

4443.name: Annual Rituals
4443.requirement: Complete the Halloween Rituals (Annual) achievement. This achievement can only be completed once per year.

4463.name: Rolling Racer: Tropic Valley Raceway
4463.requirement: Complete a lap of the roller beetle race in Brisban Wildlands within the time limit. (This achievement can be completed in the race event or adventure.)

4466.name: Rolling Competitor: Tropic Valley Raceway
4466.requirement: Complete 15 laps of the roller beetle race in Brisban Wildlands. (This achievement can be completed in the race event or adventure.)

4543.name: Thunderhead Peaks Insight: Shattered Bay
4543.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in Thunderhead Peaks.

4546.name: Chasing Tales: Crush Them
4546.description: No hammer fell as hard as Katarin's.
4546.requirement: Defeat 30 enemies while wielding a hammer in Thunderhead Peaks.

bits.text: Learned of Katarin the Bonecrusher.
Defeated 30 enemies while wielding a hammer in Thunderhead Peaks.

4559.name: Dwarven Room Raider
4559.requirement: Gather dwarven plates from all the rooms in the Dwarven Catacombs.

bits.text: Dwarven Sauna
Dwarven Library
Gauntlet Room
Tomb of Marhan
Crystal Room

4587.name: Chasing Tales: Gutshot
4587.description: No use finishing 'em. They're already dead.
4587.requirement: Inflict bleeding on 20 enemies while wielding a pistol in Thunderhead Peaks.

bits.text: Learned of Durio the Contemptuous.
Inflicted bleeding on 20 enemies while wielding a pistol in Thunderhead Peaks.

4643.name: Warclaw Body Armor
4643.description: Warclaw body armor is of the highest quality.
4643.requirement: Unlock the warclaw body armor by purchasing it with WvW Skirmish Claim Tickets from the warclaw vendor.

4648.name: Always Land on Your Feet
4648.requirement: Let your warclaw break your fall.

4651.name: (Annual) Super Adventure Box Nostalgia
4651.requirement: Complete  annual Super Adventure Box achievement. This achievement can be completed once every year.

4724.name: Skyscale of Spirit
4724.requirement: Infuse your skyscale egg with spirit.

bits.text: Speak with Amaranda the Lonesome at Venlin Vale in Brisban Wildlands.
Visit Palawa Joko's tomb at the Central Brand Scar in Jahai Bluffs.
Visit the Ancestor Tree at the Ruined Procession in Jahai Bluffs.
Visit the shrine to Turai Ossa's defeat at Deadlock Sweep in Elon Riverlands.
Visit Prophet's Fall in Desert Highlands.

4796.name: Terrain Tamed
4796.description: It takes true grit to crush the Cardinal of Earth.

4853.name: Bonus Event: World Boss Rush
4853.description: Defeat world bosses around Tyria to earn bonus rewards!

4924.name: Daily Grothmar Gauntlet Runner
4924.requirement: Complete the Gauntlet of the Khan-Ur.

4939.name: Ballooning Targets
4939.description: All right, hotshot—let's see what you've got.
4939.requirement: Shoot every target balloon in the target shooting event at least once.

4966.name: Ash Training Course: Gold
4966.requirement: Get gold in the Ash training course.

5036.name: Stop Hitting Yourself
5036.requirement: Defeat your haunt in the Necromancer's Ritual event.

5066.name: Skyscale Toy Training
5066.requirement: Unlock all the abilities of your pet skyscale.

5073.name: Daily Bonus Rewards: Snowball Mayhem
5073.requirement: Win a round of Snowball Mayhem.

5118.name: Legendary Whisper of Jormag
5118.requirement: Defeat the Whisper of Jormag in the Strike Mission.

5139.name: Wolverine's Revelation
5139.requirement: Defeat the Wolverine's Champion Boneskinner while fighting Drakkar in Bjora Marches.

5141.name: Break Drakkar
5141.description: The whispers are silenced. For now.
5141.requirement: Defeat Drakkar within its lair in Bjora Marches

5173.name: Vista Viewer
5173.description: Always on the lookout for a good view.
5173.requirement: View 3 vistas in any of the following beginner maps: Queensdale, Wayfarer Foothills, Plains of Ashford, Caledon Forest, or Metrica Province.

5182.name: Moving Up the Ranks
5182.requirement: Complete the Forging Steel vision with a final rank of Imperator.

5185.name: Cinder Steeltemper's Footsteps
5185.requirement:
Collect items related to Cinder Steeltemper's history to earn her signature Steel Warband sword.
<c=@reminder>Requires access to previous Icebrood Saga episodes to complete.</c>

bits.text: Found inside an Emissary Chest in the Eye of the North after completing a Steel Warband vision.
Found in Eye of the North.
Found in the Blood Legion fahrar in Grothmar Valley.
Found in the chest after the Metal Legion concert in Grothmar Valley.
Found in the river near the training grounds in Grothmar Valley.
Purchased from a Rally Provisioner in Grothmar Valley.
Found by completing any event in Grothmar Valley.
Found in the Canton Factorium area at the Black Citadel.
Found inside the chest at the end of Vexa's Lab in Fireheart Rise.
Chance to drop from destroyer enemies. Guaranteed from megadestroyer.
Crafted or purchased from the Black Lion Trading Post.
Created by killing multiple Branded enemies in Blazeridge Steppes.
Speak with Cinder after defeating the Ancient Forgeman.
Purchased from Fahrtak Shatterfiend near the Brokentooth Maw waypoint in Blazeridge Steppes.
Destroy a large Idol of Jormag in Bjora Marches.
Found inside an Emissary Chest in Eye of the North after opening it with three crystals.

5207.name: Priority Strike: Voice of the Fallen and Claw of the Fallen
5207.requirement: Defeat the Voice of the Fallen and Claw of the Fallen in the Raven Sanctum Strike Mission.

5241.name: Unintended Coursework
5241.description: Maybe it's more of a misplaced feature.
5241.requirement: Destroy all of the glitches in Super Adventure Box.

bits.text: World 1 Zone 1: The bee dogs pass it on the way home.
World 1 Zone 2: High in the branches over the improper water.
World 1 Zone 3: In the cliff walls near a hollow tower.
World 2 Zone 1: Above the drifting logs.
World 2 Zone 2: Outside the furniture shop in the sky.
World 2 Zone 3: Sheltered high in the storm. Bring your flute.

5400.name: Daily Drizzlewood Coast Corrupted Hunter
5400.requirement: Defeat  Abberant, Fallen, Sons of Svanir, or Frost Legion.

5476.name: ...With Feeling!
5476.requirement: Play through every chapter of Jormag Rising with voiceover added.

bits.text: Behind Enemy Lines
Wrench in the Works
A Simple Negotiation
Pantheon of the Wild
One Charr, One Dragon, One Champion

5521.name: Ebon Vanguard Global Ranks
5521.requirement: Speak with the Ebon Vanguard field leader in Eye of the North once the global support goals have been met.

5585.name: Dragon Ice Infuser
5585.requirement: Unlock all recipes to craft the Azure Dragon Slayer weapons.

5684.name: Ooze Transportation 101
5684.description: Deliver an ooze from the beehive to the mountain.
5684.requirement: Deliver an ooze to the ooze farmer in World 1, Zone 1 of Super Adventure Box.

5816.name: Return to A Meeting of Ministers
5816.requirement: Complete the mission A Meeting of Ministers in Living World Season 3 Episode 4.

5834.name: Return to Research in Rata Novus
5834.requirement: Complete the mission Research in Rata Novus in Living World Season 3 Episode 1.

5854.name: Split Defense
5854.requirement: Participate in Twisted Marionette portal defense events.

5855.name: Wrath of the Twisted Marionette Participant
5855.requirement: Defeat the Twisted Marionette during the Wrath of the Twisted Marionette bonus event to help stabilize the Mists and contribute to the global event!

5883.name: Back to the Past
5883.requirement: Revisit and complete a vision of the past mission using the Scrying Pool in Eye of the North.

5938.name: Woodland Management: Sandswept Isles
5938.requirement: Log wood  times in the Sandswept Isles.

5970.name: Revenge of the Claw of Jormag
5970.requirement: Participate in a successful siege of the Frost Citadel.

5973.name: Ore Miner: Drizzlewood Coast
5973.requirement: Mine ore  times in Drizzlewood Coast.

5974.name: Crop Harvester: Forging Steel
5974.requirement: Harvest plants  times in Forging Steel.

6023.name: Return to Thunderhead Peaks
6023.requirement: Complete  Return to All or Nothing achievements.

6040.name: Court Duty: Gathering Evidence
6040.requirement: Complete Court Duty achievements in the Shadow of the Mad King category to acquire clues about the latest incident in the Mad Realm.

6066.name: Turtle Unlock: Getting Stronger
6066.requirement: Feed your turtle various fish fillets.
6066.locked_text: Unlocks once your turtle has outgrown baby food.

6083.name: Light These Streets
6083.description: Do not light the lanterns because they need to be lit, but because joy is found in bringing light to the world.
6083.requirement: Transfer power to  jade lanterns at points of interest in New Kaineng City. These lanterns will only appear after 100% map exploration.

Help Xunlai Jade test and promote jade tech.
Help the East Precinct protect Grub Lane.

6186.name: Dead Play
6186.description: Only the bravest or most absentminded spirits frolic in such a dangerous place.
6186.requirement: Play with all the shrine guardian infants in Dragon's End at least once.

bits.text: Hint: Around Brotherhood's Watch.
Hint: Lounging around a tropical stop.
Hint: Wants to catch a glimpse of a Jade Maw.
Hint: Hiding under a ramp.
Hint: Watching the Chantry of the Crab from a distance.
Hint: Hiding in Emerald Bluff.
Hint: Blending in outside a Jade Brotherhood outpost.
Hint: Admiring jade blocks.

Hint: Below the residential district.

Hint: Standing watch over the miners' camp.
Hint: Enjoying the breeze beneath a massive turbine.
Hint: Plotting to steal food offerings at a serpent's shrine.
Hint: Quietly watching the Shrine of Hanuku.
Hint: Watching a silent beach.
Hint: Watching over the Harvest Temple Observatory from a safe distance.
Hint: Spying on the Jade Brotherhood from above.
Hint: Listening in on the Speakers.
Hint: Standing on a crane platform.

6226.name: Echovald Wilds Insight: Qinkaishi Basin
6226.requirement: Discover this End of Dragons Mastery Insight in the Echovald Wilds.

6254.name: The Premium Tour
6254.requirement: Experience all the sights and sounds of the New Kaineng City docks.

bits.text: A pair of anglers debate proper licensure for their trade.
A tengu is asked about traveling to central Tyria.
Two Canthan citizens discuss the border reopening.
A tengu attempts an...unconventional mercantile exchange.
An aristocrat is impressed by the commander's fashion choices.
An aristocrat welcomes the commander to New Kaineng.
A common fisherman makes an unusual bait choice.
A worker describes their excitement about jade tech.
A commoner gives some reading recommendations.
A peasant approaches the commander with a dubious proposal.
A newspaper clipping found atop a stack of crates.
A research log sitting on a box.
A cargo manifest detailing a shipment of supplies.
A soiled pamphlet hidden behind vendor stalls.
A poster hanging by a noodle stand.
A diary left on a lonely boat.

6302.name: The Six
6302.requirement: Find ancient statuettes of The Six that have been scattered around Cantha.

bits.text: Found in sunken chests around Cantha.
Found in hidden chests around New Kaineng City.
Found in hidden chests across Cantha.
Found in hidden chests around Dragon's End.
Found in hidden chests around Seitung Province.
Found in hidden chests around the Echovald Wilds.

6341.name: New Kaineng Insight: Lutgardis Market
6341.requirement: Discover this End of Dragons Mastery Insight in New Kaineng City.

6351.name: Echovald Wilds Insight: Altrumm Mines Catacomb
6351.requirement: Discover this End of Dragons Mastery Insight in the Echovald Wilds.

6363.name: Orrian Fisher
6363.description: <c=@flavor>The charm of fishing is in pursuing something elusive, though attainable. It is a simple yet profound practice of hope.</c>
6363.requirement: Collect  different fish from the waterways of Orr.

6413.name: Gravity
6413.requirement: Collect these  items and skins to receive the catalyst's hammer, Gravity.
6413.locked_text: Begin training the elementalist's catalyst elite specialization.

bits.text: Begin training the elementalist's catalyst elite specialization.
Completely train the elementalist's catalyst elite specialization.
Combine an Oiled Orichalcum Hammer Head, 25 Globs of Ectoplasm, Chunks of Jade, and Chunks of Petrified Echovald Resin in the Mystic Forge.
As an elementalist, complete the Seitung Province meta-event.
As an elementalist, complete the New Kaineng City map meta-event.
As an elementalist, complete the Mai Trin story instance or strike.
As a catalyst, complete the End of Dragons storyline or the Battle for the Jade Sea meta-event.
Catch a unicorn fish in Dragon's End.
Purchased from the crafting research vendor in Seitung Province.
Purchased from the map currency vendor in New Kaineng City.
Earned by defeating Aetherblade enemies in the Echovald Wilds.
Earn map completion in Dragon's End as an elementalist.
As an elementalist, defeat the spider boss in Zen Daijun.
Acquired by harvesting soybeans as an elementalist.

6461.name: The History of New Kaineng
6461.requirement: Find  lore tablets in New Kaineng.

bits.text: New Kaineng Zoning Record 0001
New Kaineng Zoning Record 0013

New Kaineng Zoning Record 0039

6528.name: Ready Ore Not
6528.requirement: In the Molten Furnace story instance, find all of the hidden mining nodes.

Ore Node 2

6536.name: A Quiet Celebration
6536.requirement: Complete the story chapter A Quiet Celebration.

6554.name: Guiding Sign
6554.description: A much longer journey begins with the smallest step.
6554.requirement: Help guide refugees in Diessa Plateau by rebuilding signposts along the road to the Black Citadel.

6607.name: Defeating Enemy Factions
6607.requirement: Defeat  centaur, Sons of Svanir, Inquest, Nightmare Court, or Flame Legion enemy.

6633.name: The Facet of Plant and Mind
6633.requirement: Unlock all legendary Mordremoth weapon variants.

6731.name: Viewing Vistas II
6731.requirement:
View / vista in Snowden Drifts, Diessa Plateau, Brisban Wildlands, or Kessex Hills.

<c=@reminder>Vistas are scenic locations that show the world from a new perspective, and they are marked with a red triangle icon on the map.</c>

6736.name: Decade of Champions: Frozen Maw
6736.requirement: Defeat the Champion Svanir Shaman Chief and break his control over the ice elemental in Frusenfell Creek in Wayfarer's Foothills.

6747.name: Kraitmare Averted, Again
6747.requirement: Defeat Ensolyss within the time limit.

6771.name: Aurene's Facet of Persuasion
6771.requirement: Aid Leivas in discovering a new form for your Aurene-based legendary weapon.

bits.text: Speak with Leivas to purchase enough Elder Dragon scale splinters to form a scale fragment.
Purify the scale fragment by successfully defeating the Claw of Jormag in Frostgorge Sound or Drizzlewood Coast.
Acquire a completed memory of Jormag by collecting enough memory fragments of Elder Dragons.
Defeat Drakkar in Bjora Marches while wielding an Aurene-based legendary weapon.
Purify the lingering Icebrood aether at one of Aurene's focusing crystals located at the Den of Whispers in Bjora Marches.
Return to Leivas to purchase an uncharged fragment.
Complete the Dragonstorm encounter.

6793.name: Dawn of the Next Journey
6793.requirement: Complete the story chapter Dawn of the Next Journey.

7027.name: Protector of Droknar's Light
7027.description: A flicker of light in this strange, new world.
7027.requirement: Successfully complete events around Droknar's Light.

bits.text: Protect Forgemaster Elrik while he gathers scrap metal. (Event 1 of 3)
Bring high-quality billet to Forgemaster Elrik while the forge is active. (Event 2 of 3)
Defeat the dwarf before they're fully possessed. (Event 3 of 3)
Find and stabilize condensed magic.
Stop the angry dwarves from causing a panic.
Search piles of rubble and suspicious trees for Stone Summit. (Event 1 of 2)
Help the Deldrimor defend Droknar's Light. (Event 2 of 2)
Help High Elder Farid defeat his ancient enemy.
Help Battlemaster Flintfoot prepare new trainees for combat. (Event 1 of 2)
Defeat Galene the Seething. (Event 2 of 2)
Defeat the champion engorged ice elemental.

7051.name: Astral Footprints
7051.requirement: Gather the necessary armor skins and defeat Myros the Spiteful to unlock the ability to purchase the Arcanum of Astral Footprints from the Wizard's Tower.

7063.name: Legendary Weapon: The Dreamer
7063.requirement: Craft the legendary weapon The Dreamer.

7093.name: Skywatch Archipelago Insight: Skyscale Sanctuary
7093.requirement: Discover this Secrets of the Obscure Mastery Insight in Skywatch Archipelago.

7109.name: Bloodtide Coast Incursions
7109.requirement: Repel Kryptis incursions in Bloodtide Coast.

7147.name: Skywatch Archipelago Explorer
7147.description: You've explored the fractal islands of Skywatch Archipelago.
7147.requirement: Explore all areas in Skywatch Archipelago.

bits.text: Wizard's Ascent
Devastated Garenhoff
Stargaze Ridge
Jade Mech Habitation Zone 03
The Soaring Aerie
Rata Novus Promenade
Southern Wizard's Tower
Skyward Marches
Shattered Atoll
Droknar's Light
Primal Maguuma

7174.name: Legendary Weapon: The Minstrel
7174.requirement: Craft the legendary weapon The Minstrel.

7323.name: Black Lion Stolen Goods Recovery Event
7323.requirement: Complete  Black Lion Stolen Goods Recovery Event achievements during the event period to reach the next tier.

7489.name: Dungeon Delver: Twilight Arbor
7489.requirement: Complete any path of the Twilight Arbor dungeon.

7651.name: League Participator—Conquest Season Thirty-Nine
7651.requirement: Play  ranked matches during Conquest Season Thirty-Nine.

7695.name: Power Nap
7695.requirement: Use the /sleep emote inside a tent at the Astral Ward camp.

7722.name: Rebuild and Destroy
7722.description: So nice, we'll build them twice.
7722.requirement: Help the Astral Ward gather parts to rebuild turrets in Heitor's Dominion in Inner Nayos.

7796.name: Legendary Rune Collector
7796.description: You feel a new bounce in your step now that you don't have to carry so many runes around.
7796.requirement:
Bind  legendary rune.
(Players with existing legendary runes can update this achievement when visiting Lion's Arch or the Wizard's Tower.)

7834.name: Inner Nayos: The Commons Savior
7834.description: Setting foot deeper into Eparch's territory to gain more allies.
7834.requirement: Successfully complete unique events in the Commons in Inner Nayos.

bits.text: Bring resources to Vethrax near the Well of Anguish. (Event 1 of 2)
Stop loyalists from stealing supplies. (Event 2 of 2)
Destroy hazardous nests to reduce air toxicity in the area.
Discover and eliminate Eparch's spies.

7836.name: Inner Nayos Insight: High-Elevation Skyscale Nest
7836.requirement: Discover this Secrets of the Obscure Mastery Insight in Inner Nayos.

7859.name: Foes Reborn: Chak
7859.requirement: Defeat chak enemies in any region.

7877.name: Legendary Hunter
7877.requirement: Win  rated arena game as a ranger.

7963.name: Riverside Veteran
7963.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

8128.name: Sunken Treasure Week: Mount Maelstrom
8128.description: This chest can be reopened once per week or per completion of the Master Diver achievement.
8128.requirement: Find and open the sunken chest in Mount Maelstrom.

8132.name: Sunken Treasure Week: Timberline Falls
8132.description: This chest can be reopened once per week or per completion of the Master Diver achievement.
8132.requirement: Find and open the sunken chest in Timberline Falls.

8143.name: Second Dive: Bloodstone Fen (Weekly)
8143.requirement: Use the diving goggles near the highest floating island.

8159.name: Scouting the Vale: Silver
8159.requirement: Earn a silver medal in the Scouting the Vale adventure.

8170.name: Lowland Shore Diving Goggles
8170.description: The northern waters are frigid. Might want to have a towel ready.
8170.requirement: Acquire diving goggles in Harvest Den or near the hunting village and jump into the water below.

8186.name: Janthir Syntri Insight: Greenwood's Corner
8186.requirement: Discover this Janthir Wilds Mastery Insight in Janthir Syntri.

8340.name: Warclaw Run Adventure: Gold
8340.requirement: Earn a gold time in the Warclaw Run adventure.

8403.name: Renowned Hero: Jahai Bluffs (Weekly)
8403.requirement: Complete renown hearts in Jahai Bluffs.

8582.name: Mistburned Barrens Mastery
8582.requirement: Complete  map achievements throughout Mistburned Barrens.

8595.name: Boom!
8595.requirement: Cause a massive explosion by overloading the jade construct.

8637.name: Search-and-Rescue Challenge: Gold
8637.requirement: Earn a gold medal while finding lost kodan scouts in the Search-and-Rescue challenge.

8728.name: Efficient Defender
8728.requirement: Succeed in defending against the Mistburned ambush within the time limit.
